tool_description: Access to the official Swiss Government Company register via this API. Ideal for KYB purposes
name: Switzerland Company Data
title: Switzerland Company Data

api_list.name: SearchByCompanyUID
api_list.description: This API endpoint can be used to look up a swiss company by it's UID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://switzerland-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/default/CH/103867266"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "switzerland-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://switzerland-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/default/CH/{uid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "switzerland-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
